title: Circus themed skins

replies.body:
{{champion:154}} Cannonball Zac
Make him wear a circus outfit. Instead of a slingshot for his E, have him forming a cannon with his own slime and shoot himself into the lane!

{{champion:164}} Trapeze Artist Camille
She already does something similar in her recall animation with her hookshots. Make her wear a fancy dress and all.
There was a really amazing Lion Tamer Kindred skin concept someone came up with a couple of years back (Sorry Sivir but you have enough skins lmao)
Ringmaster Kled would be really cool to see if nothing else.
